amendment.description: To require the Government Accountability Office to evaluate Buy American training policies for the Defense acquisition workforce.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5790) To require the Government Accountability Office to evaluate Buy American training policies for the Defense acquisition workforce.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 1003.
